com.polarion.alm.shared.api.model.rp.widget

Class RichPageWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polarion.alm.shared.api.model.rp.widget.RichPageWidget

  • public abstract class RichPageWidget
extends java.lang.Object
    Rich Page Widget is a visual component which can be added by the user to the Rich Page and which shows some data based on user defined parameters - see getParametersDefinition(ParameterFactory) Implementations should be state-less and not assume that only one instance is created in runtime.
    Since:
    3.9.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_ACTION_ID
      Attribute for storing the action ID.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_BUTTON
      Optional attribute for configuring the label of the confirmation button in the confirmation dialog.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_KEY
      Optional attribute for configuring the key for remembering the state of the "Don't show this again." The check-box is not shown when the attribute is not defined or the value is empty.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_TEXT
      Optional attribute for configuring the text of the confirmation dialog.
      static java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_TITLE
      Optional attribute for configuring the title of the confirmation dialog.
      static java.lang.String PARAMETER_ADVANCED
      Common ID used for the "Advanced" CompositeParameter

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeAction(RichPageWidgetActionContext context)
      This method is executed on server after user clicks (in view mode of the page) on some HTML element inside the widget which has not empty value in attribute data-action-id (ATTRIBUTE_ACTION_ID).
      java.lang.String getDescriptionHtml(RichPageWidgetContext widgetContext)
      Override this method to return additional description for current widget.
      abstract java.lang.String getDetailsHtml(RichPageWidgetContext widgetContext) 
      abstract java.lang.String getIcon(RichPageWidgetContext widgetContext) 
      abstract java.lang.String getLabel(SharedContext context)
      Plain text label of this widget.
      abstract ReadOnlyStrictMap<java.lang.String,RichPageParameter> getParametersDefinition(ParameterFactory factory)
      Returned map defines the parameters for this widget.
      The parameter IDs (the keys in the map) must not contain the dot ('.') character.

      The parameters are cloned before they are used for the concrete widget instance when it is either used of the first time or before the parameters are initialized from persistence

      The returned parameters can already contain default values.
      java.io.InputStream getResourceStream(java.lang.String path)
      Use RichPageWidgetContext.resourceUrl(String) to create the relative URL to the servlet which calls this method to serve the (static) resource.
      java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> getTags(SharedContext context)
      Returns tags for filtering in the widgets sidebar.

      The standard localized tags can be obtained by calling context.localization().getString() with one of the following values (or similar ones which will be added in the future):

      richpages.widget.tag.generic
      richpages.widget.tag.charts
      richpages.widget.tag.planning
      richpages.widget.tag.scripting
      richpages.widget.tag.workitems
      richpages.widget.tag.testRuns
      boolean isInline()
      Return true, when this widget is "inline" meaning that it can be inserted inside the text paragraph
      void processParameterDependencies(RichPageWidgetDependenciesContext context)
      This method allows widget developer to change configurations of some parameters based on values of some other parameters.
      abstract java.lang.String renderHtml(RichPageWidgetRenderingContext context)
      Main method of the widget which renders the widget's HTML which is shown in the page.

      • ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_BUTTON

        public static final java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_BUTTON
        Optional attribute for configuring the label of the confirmation button in the confirmation dialog. Default label OK (localized) is used when the attribute is not defined or the value is empty.
        Since:
        3.9.2
        See Also:
        executeAction(RichPageWidgetActionContext), Constant Field Values

      • ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_KEY
        Optional attribute for configuring the key for remembering the state of the "Don't show this again." The check-box is not shown when the attribute is not defined or the value is empty. The key should start with your company's name space prefix to avoid name conflicts.
        Since:
        3.9.2
        See Also:
        executeAction(RichPageWidgetActionContext), Constant Field Values

      • getTags

        @NotNull
public java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> getTags(@NotNull
                                                             SharedContext context)
        Returns tags for filtering in the widgets sidebar.

        The standard localized tags can be obtained by calling context.localization().getString() with one of the following values (or similar ones which will be added in the future):

        richpages.widget.tag.generic
        richpages.widget.tag.charts
        richpages.widget.tag.planning
        richpages.widget.tag.scripting
        richpages.widget.tag.workitems
        richpages.widget.tag.testRuns
        Since:
        3.9.1

      • getParametersDefinition

        @NotNull
public abstract ReadOnlyStrictMap<java.lang.String,RichPageParameter> getParametersDefinition(@NotNull
                                                                                                       ParameterFactory factory)
        Returned map defines the parameters for this widget.
        The parameter IDs (the keys in the map) must not contain the dot ('.') character.

        The parameters are cloned before they are used for the concrete widget instance when it is either used of the first time or before the parameters are initialized from persistence

        The returned parameters can already contain default values.

      • renderHtml

        @NotNull
public abstract java.lang.String renderHtml(@NotNull
                                                     RichPageWidgetRenderingContext context)
        Main method of the widget which renders the widget's HTML which is shown in the page.
        See Also:
        for details about how to correctly use it in rendering of the widgets.

      • getResourceStream

        @NotNull
 @GwtIncompatible
public java.io.InputStream getResourceStream(@NotNull
                                                                        java.lang.String path)
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Use RichPageWidgetContext.resourceUrl(String) to create the relative URL to the servlet which calls this method to serve the (static) resource.

        Note: Requested resource might be cached by browser, so in that case this method will not be called. In other words the requested resource will not be updated on client side until the cached resource invalidates or will be removed from browser cache.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case that resource cannot be served.

      • processParameterDependencies

        public void processParameterDependencies(@NotNull
                                         RichPageWidgetDependenciesContext context)
        This method allows widget developer to change configurations of some parameters based on values of some other parameters.

        This method is called on server after any parameter which was marked as RichPageParameter.Builder.dependencySource(boolean) was changed by user on the client side. It is also called before showing the parameter editors in the sidebar and before calling the renderHtml(RichPageWidgetRenderingContext)

        Changes to parameters which were not marked as RichPageParameter.Builder.dependencySource(boolean) are silently ignored.

        Configuration of the parameters can be changed using the Setter interfaces. For example BooleanParameter.Setter returned by BooleanParameter.set() method.
        Since:
        3.9.2
        See Also:
        RichPageParameter.Builder.dependencySource(boolean), RichPageParameter.Builder.dependencyTarget(boolean)

      • executeAction

        public void executeAction(@NotNull
                          RichPageWidgetActionContext context)
        This method is executed on server after user clicks (in view mode of the page) on some HTML element inside the widget which has not empty value in attribute data-action-id (ATTRIBUTE_ACTION_ID). This element can be created by the renderHtml(RichPageWidgetRenderingContext) method.

        This method is also executed on server after calling the JavaScript function executeWidgetAction on the client side. See PublicJS.executeWidgetAction(Node, boolean, String) for details.

        This method can persist some changes because it is executed in WriteTransaction which can be accessed by RichPageWidgetActionContext.transaction()

        Confirmation dialog is displayed before the action is executed if the same HTML element as mentioned above contains not empty value in at least one of the following attributes:
        data-confirm-title (ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_TITLE)
        data-confirm-text (ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_TEXT)

        Following attributes can be used to further configure the confirmation dialog:
        data-confirm-button (ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_BUTTON)
        data-confirm-key (ATTRIBUTE_CONFIRM_KEY)

        What should happen on the client after the action is executed can be set by the following methods:
        RichPageWidgetActionContext.message(String)
        RichPageWidgetActionContext.executeJavaScript(String)
        RichPageWidgetActionContext.replaceWithHtml(String)
        RichPageWidgetActionContext.refresh(boolean)
        Since:
        3.9.2
